code:
%% Integrated Proposal - Policy View
graph TD
  %% Governance / Policy
  G0[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
  G1[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
  G2[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]

  %% CLEAR Core
  subgraph CORE[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
    direction LR
    KMS[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
    MQ[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
    WN[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
    DB[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
    MET[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
    KMS-->MQ-->WN-->DB-->MET
  end

  %% Edge / Municipal
  subgraph EDGE[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
    direction TB
    W1[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
    W2[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
  end

  %% AI / Audit
  subgraph AI[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
    A1[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
    A2[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
  end

  %% Flows
  G1-- "決済依頼（バーチャルデビット/トークン認証）" -->G2
  G2-- "Txイベント（When/Who/Whom/Coin/Value）" -->EDGE
  EDGE-- "Witnessログ送信（非同期）" -->CORE
  CORE-- "整合証跡（Merkle Root / 署名）" -->G0
  AI-- "AI結果の監査証跡付与" -->CORE
  G0-- "方針・KPI（E-MAD）" -->MET
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
